A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you are a literalist\, the genre is not for you. Same if you have harped on fan theories. Let the movie unfold. It is a rich and entertaining film as much about the issues of the day as in a galaxy far\, far away. Rian Johnson and his story consultants at Lucasfilm reach deep and find meaning intertwined with humour and action. As a first generation Star Wars fan I have appreciated the Disney era and its respect for the tone of the Original Trilogy as well as its potential for a rich underbelly\, especially in this period where the First Order (of business) reigns indeed. If a stronger resistance is inspired\, so much the better.
